Html:
The latest I could find about the Prism v4 release schedule was this June-2010 blog article:
http://blogs.msdn.com/b/blaine/archive/2010/06/16/prism-4-0-plan-amp-drop-available-on-codeplex.aspx

It says "...the final phase will be delivered in late September or October...".

I'm just curious where "Prism v4 - Drop 8" fits into the timeline.  Is it "feature complete"?  If not, what still needs to be added?

"Drop 8" is listed as an "Alpha".  Are their rough target months for "Beta" and "Release" dates?

Thanks,
Alex

Hi Alex,

Let me expand based on some feedback from the product team.

You will find Prism official information in compositewpf.codeplex.com (specially the home or downloads pages).

Regarding the road map:

  • Later this week: Drop 9, beta quality.  The API’s will be very close to lock down. 
  • Oct 14th: beta quality, the API’s will be locked down and the documentation will be very close to completion.
  • Early November: Prism v4 RTM, code complete, documentation complete and published on MSDN.

I hope you find this information helpful.

Fernando Antivero
http://blogs.southworks.net/fantivero
